title: Ranged Area Chart with Line
reference-overview:
This is a standard ranged area graph but with a line defining specific data points.
The coloring of this graph is contained within the evolution-theme.js file located here: /assets/scripts/lib/highcharts/themes

Basic area chart | Area chart with negative values | Stacked area chart | Percentage Area Chart | Area chart with missing points | Area chart with inverted axis | Spline area chart | Ranged area chart | Sparkline area
reference-mobile: This graph is responsive and will work on most mobile devices.
reference-technical:
We test our software on many browsers using the latest versions. Knowing that Internet Explorer users have a tendency not to upgrade we also systematically test older versions of that browser. Highcharts runs on the following browser versions:

BrandVersions supported
Internet Explorer6.0 +
Firefox2.0 +
Chrome1.0 +
Safari4.0 +
Opera9.0 +
iOS (Safari)3.0 +
Android Browser2.0 + *)
reference-example-version-label: Version (Default, Option A, Option B, etc.)
